data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=tppM1pwA5ikQ7kNvgGR6qHp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYASt1zdHlePVQbAuqHslA7_7NcY6UTV_OyC3iiuJA9J3w&oe=66A7910C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=WeqhdwQkEqcQ7kNvgGayNtO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD_gLKKKeXGkFaaBGWKQqB3qL8OZSRFHVET4NbmaRQljw&oe=66A78F1F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GezF2UED0jMQ7kNvgEYCbNk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAYMrpjTY8ltdzgdgcmwe4Nb-6Pr8IPpZg7yGKBhGFcgw&oe=66A77471)
